Protecting the planet is everyone's responsibility


Get involved. Invest in a better future.







World Environment Day 
Learn more





Stop food loss and waste
Learn more





International Day of Clean Air for blue skies
Learn more





See all Campaigns











Act Now


Be part of #GenerationRestoration

Ten years to heal our planet. Every action counts.


See more












Act Now
Join the global movement to #BeatAirPollution
Register your World Environment Day and tell us how you are beating air pollution. 
Register your event












UNEP Goodwill Ambassadors
Discover 










Act Now, Speak Up!
Get involved 




















 



Did you know?
Plastic packaging accounts for 50 per cent of plastic waste.

Ten years to heal our planet. Every action counts.
